tldr: Due to a vulnerability in the `request` package (CVE-2023-28155), `razorpay` is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This vulnerability has been fixed in the patch version by replacing the `request` library with the `axios` library.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a razorpay version which is within vulnerability ranges.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `razorpay` library to the patch version.
